title: MySTC
summary: Control you accounts and services directly through MySTC
description: Thanks for using MySTC.Manage your STC accounts with the MySTC Android app, which gives a full android user experience. provides access to your bills, data and call usage, subscribed packages and services, the latest STC offers and much more.- Manage your STC profile- Login with your STC Online account or using a One Time Password- Instantly view all your information at a glance with the MySTC dashboard- Support for Jawal, Hatif and Sawa numbers- View your latest bill, as well as previous bills- View your up-to-date (real time) internet data usage- View your Qitaf details, and redeem your Qitaf points instantly- View your STC packages and services, and instantly subscribe/unsubscribe- View all your call usage, and switch between name and number- View the latest MySTC Offers- View all STC outlets, kiosks and Tamayouz outlets- View your Tamayouz account information and the latest Tamayouz offers- Link any Sawa number with your ID- Recharge your Sawa number instantlyTags: MySTC , STC , Saudi Telecom Company .
descriptionHTML:
Thanks for using MySTC.
Manage your STC accounts with the MySTC Android app, which gives a full android user experience. provides access to your bills, data and call usage, subscribed packages and services, the latest STC offers and much more.
- Manage your STC profile
- Login with your STC Online account or using a One Time Password
- Instantly view all your information at a glance with the MySTC dashboard
- Support for Jawal, Hatif and Sawa numbers
- View your latest bill, as well as previous bills
- View your up-to-date (real time) internet data usage
- View your Qitaf details, and redeem your Qitaf points instantly
- View your STC packages and services, and instantly subscribe/unsubscribe
- View all your call usage, and switch between name and number
- View the latest MySTC Offers
- View all STC outlets, kiosks and Tamayouz outlets
- View your Tamayouz account information and the latest Tamayouz offers
- Link any Sawa number with your ID
- Recharge your Sawa number instantly
Tags: MySTC , STC , Saudi Telecom Company .
comments: To stc management,, Please bring back the 65sar sawa offer 10gb Internet +500 on net minutes this is really affordable data for a household worker like me..recently most offers are really expensive..in my part i am a data user for 3 years..lowest price and greater data offer is necessary..please bring back this offer to MY STC App...thank you so much..
Very easy to use and helpful. We can use it to do so many things with one touch.
What does it mean and how to do it as I cant find it anywhere in App. ((- Book a device and pick it up from one of STC branches.))
أتمنى تعدلو في واجهة التطبيق يعني قبل لاادخل على التطبيق أختار رقم من ارقامي وادخل عليه مثل السابق
Useless piece of garbage with which you can basically do nothing
I love stc internet packages and the entire network. Keep up the good work and keep us connected
recentChanges: - Book a device and pick it up from one of STC branches.
- Preview your data usage which you have consumed on Social Media Apps.
